item.title: Google’s subscriptions rise in Q4 as YouTube pulls $60B in yearly revenue
item.description: The company said it now has 325 million paying users across Google One and YouTube Premium, up from 300 million users three months earlier.

item.title: Spotify ventures into physical book sales, adds new audiobook features

item.title: The Best Flower Delivery Services of 2026, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Skip the sad grocery store bouquet this Valentine’s Day. These online flower delivery services do the heavy lifting for you—just don't forget the card...

item.title: What Is Thread? Matter’s Smart Home Network Protocol, Explained
item.description: Thread is a mesh networking protocol that connects low-power smart home gadgets, and it’s one of Matter’s underlying technologies.
